Title: CDC reports 10,491 coronavirus cases, 150 deaths - Reuters India
Description: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) on Thursday reported 10,491 cases of coronavirus, an increase of 3,404 from its previous count, and said the death toll had risen by 53 to 150, the biggest one-day jump so far.

Title: How IBM’s supercomputer Summit is helping in the fight against coronavirus - The Indian Express
Description: IBM's supercomputer Summit, the world's most powerful one, has also been utilised in search for drugs that might be most effective against the coronavirus or COVID-19, for which there is no cure or vaccine at the moment.

Title: Coronavirus: Digestive symptoms prominent among Covid-19 patients, finds Study - India Today
Description: According to the researchers, nearly half of Covid-19 patients enrolled in the study conducted in the Hubei province of China presented digestive symptoms, such as diarrhea and anorexia, and cited it as their chief complaint.
